altCompliant.description: A reference to an alternative delegate that is compliant with the Common Language Specification (CLS). Only necessary if this delegate is not CLS compliant..

assemblies.description: A collection of assemblies in which this delegate function resides.

description.description: A detailed description of the delegate, used for supplementary information or detailed usage.

examples.description: Detailed examples for usage of the delegate..

inheritances.description: A collection of references to objects (classes, interfaces, etc) that this delegate inherits.

isDeprecated.description: Whether or not this delegate is deprecated.

namespace.description: A reference to the namespace owning this delegate.

isNotClsCompliant.description: Whether or not the delegate is compliant with the Common Language Specification.

seeAlso.description: A collection of references to related documents.

summary.description: The main summary of the delegate.

syntax.description: Example code syntax for the delegate, displayed in a code block in the document.
